# Repository topics

This file lists recommended GitHub repository topics to improve discoverability and help categorization on GitHub.

Suggested topics (add/remove as appropriate):

- python
- flask
- api
- github
- github-api
- automation
- tools
- developer-tools
- code-quality
- testing
- ci
- github-actions
- static-analysis
- linting
- open-source
- software-architecture
- ai
- machine-learning
- security
- devops

Tip: Use the `scripts/set_topics.py` script or the `Set repository topics` workflow to apply these topics to the repository automatically.
